revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=CG3000 |revision=-STAUS |asin= |fcc_date=11/20/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model=ACM6380 |manuf_rev=REV 1.04A |availability=now |type=wireless router,cable modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=PY309300119 |pcb_id=ACM6380 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3380Z;BCM3380ZKFSBG; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405DMI-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QI-HCE6 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Pegatron UPWL6025 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43225 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115S;BCM53115SKFBG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Dual Channel Ringing SLIC;Legerity (Microsemi);Le9530DETC;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, VoIP, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=E0:46:9A |oui_eth=E0:46:9A }} {{TagLine|Wireless Cable Voice Gateway}} :[http://support.netgear.com/product/CG3000-1STAUS Support page]
"PCB MADE IN CHINA" and "ACM6380 REV: 1.04A" (''ASUS P/N'') :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ''[[Pegatron]]'' is the presumed OEM (used by ''Optus Australia'').
:DOCSIS 3.0 8x4<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
This device probably uses BCM3380 like the [[Netgear CG3000D]]. :The FCC photos for this device do not show the VoIP portion. This device appears to have been primarily used outside of the US.
For ''Optus Australia'' ([http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/BB_Guide_7-Apr-11_1302140392_1382777E_0411_166321_HR.pdf manual], [http://docs.netgear.com/cg3000/enu/202-10842-01/usermanual.pdf UM]), the default SSID appears to be :'''OPTUSVXXXXXX''' (upper case hex letters, last 6 digits of CM MAC).
===Teardown=== *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2016/07/16/inside-the-netgear-wireless-cable-voice-gateway-cg3000-1staus/ ''Netgear Wireless Cable Voice Gateway CG3000'' on '''InsideGadgets'''] <!-- Le9530DETC (SLIC) - Zarlink • Legerity • Microsemi -->
===See also=== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]]
